content.rendered:
RAJ MUDHAR

Mortgage Associate

  • 204.963.9481
  • raj.mudhar@vinegroup.ca
  • English
  • Winnipeg

Raj Mudhar arrived in Canada in 2011 and began his career as a bank teller.

By February 2013, he transitioned to a Mobile Mortgage Specialist, beginning a rewarding professional journey. In 2014, he achieved his first accolade, ranking among the top 175 Mortgage Specialists across Canada.

With a dedicated focus on understanding the unique financial needs of his clients and continued support from his network of business sources, including realtors, builders, and previous clients, he was honoured to receive the GOLD, Platinum, and Paragon awards year after year, signifying his place among the top 10% producers at the bank in Canada.

With over 12 years of financial experience, he has found deep satisfaction in his role as a Mortgage Advisor, proudly assisting thousands of families in achieving their dreams of homeownership.

Whether you are purchasing a home, considering a mortgage transfer, or exploring mortgage refinancing to consolidate debt, he can help you discover the best mortgage solution. He is committed to ensuring your mortgage experience is comfortable and easy.
